metadata.synopsis: Default dialogue for a Flaming Fist in the entrance hall of Wyrm's Rock in Wyrm's Crossing. Vignette character, one-liner.Vignette summary:"People are going back and forth on an hourly basis usually. We should still see traces of Flaming Fists coming and going, as well as show the omnipresence of the Steel Watchers and other security systems (inert traps from Gortash’s boss fight that activate only if you attack him at the ceremony would be great)."
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/BGO_Main_A- goto 4 44 220- Step forward into Wyrm's Rock fortress - speak to S_WYR_Fortress_FlamingFist002_baaf58e1-8880-4dda-a351-4d4680c3cb2f

0.speaker: Fist Larys
0.context: NodeContext: Instruction, not to be argued with

1.speaker: Fist Larys
1.text: If you've something to report, take it elsewhere. I'm on watch.
